item.title: 法国国民联盟支持黄金涨至每盎司6000美元，因涨势"合乎逻辑"
item.description: 法国巴黎银行分析师戴维·威尔逊表示，随着宏观经济和地缘政治风险持续存在，金价可能在年底前攀升至每盎司6000美元，黄金与白银的比价也将走高。【原文：Gold may climb to $6,000 an ounce by the end of the year and bullion’s ratio to silver is set to rise as macroeconomic and geopolitical risks persist, BNP Paribas SA’s David Wilson said.】

item.title: 中国太阳能电池价格上涨冲击印度供应链
item.description: 中国太阳能电池价格的飙升正令印度组件制造商感到不安，这些企业依赖邻国供应这一关键组件。【原文：Surging prices of solar cells from China are rattling Indian module makers who depend on the neighboring nation for the essential component.】

item.title: 埃及鹅肝酱销售商Gourmet上市首日股价上涨
item.description: 埃及高端食品杂货商Gourmet Egypt SAE在埃及证券交易所首次公开募股（IPO）首日股价飙升38%，创下该国今年首例IPO的最高涨幅纪录。【原文：Shares of premium grocer Gourmet Egypt SAE rose as much as 38% in their debut on the Egyptian stock exchange, in the country’s first initial public offering of the year.】

item.title: 赞比亚财政部长称将在八月大选后敲定与国际货币基金组织的协议
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长西通贝科·穆索科特瓦内表示，该国将在定于8月举行的全国大选后，才与国际货币基金组织就新经济计划展开磋商。【原文：Zambia will only conclude talks with the International Monetary Fund for a new economic program after general elections set for August, Finance Minister Situmbeko Musokotwane said.】

item.title: 钻石行业低迷促使博茨瓦纳提议提高所得税
item.description: 博茨瓦纳计划提高企业税和个人所得税，以弥补钻石收入的下滑，并遏制不断扩大的预算赤字。【原文：Botswana plans to raise corporate and personal taxes to offset a slump in diamond revenue and rein in a widening budget deficit.】

item.title: 私募基金Harith正洽谈收购南非最大航空公司
item.description: 南非私募股权公司哈里斯通用合伙公司计划收购廉价航空公司FlySafair，这家管理着30亿美元资产的投资机构正扩大其在非洲大陆的交通运输投资组合。【原文：South African private equity firm Harith General Partners plans to acquire budget carrier FlySafair as the investor with $3 billion in assets expands its transport portfolio on the continent.】

item.title: 字母表公司通过英镑和瑞士法郎市场达成巨额债务交易
item.description: 字母公司首次发行英镑和瑞士法郎计价债券，其中包括极其罕见的百年期债券，此前该公司已在美国完成一笔200亿美元的巨额债券交易。【原文：Alphabet Inc. is selling sterling and Swiss franc-denominated bonds for the first time, including an ultra-rare issue of a 100-year note, following a bumper $20 billion deal in the US.】

item.title: 日本长期国债上涨，因高市早苗胜选缓解财政担忧
item.description: 日本政府债券价格上涨，因首相高市早苗赢得历史性选举胜利，提振了投资者信心，认为市场能够消化增加的财政支出。【原文：Japan’s government bonds gained after Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s historic election triumph fueled confidence among investors that increased fiscal spending can be digested by the market.】

item.title: 中国债券期货持仓量创纪录，多头押注激增
item.description: 中国政府债券近期反弹正吸引更多交易员投身衍生品市场，这反映出随着债券市场信心增强，投资者对避险和对冲的需求日益旺盛。【原文：Chinese government bonds’ recent recovery is drawing more traders into derivatives, reflecting stronger demand for safety and hedging as confidence in the debt market grows.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所寻求新任首席执行官，海伦·洛夫特豪斯将于五月卸任
item.description: 据声明称，澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司备受争议的首席执行官海伦·洛夫特豪斯将于五月卸任。【原文：Helen Lofthouse, the embattled chief executive officer of ASX Ltd., is set to step down from her role in May, according to a statement.】

item.title: 意大利西雅美银行利润符合预期，首席执行官着眼于与Mediobanca的整合
item.description: 西恩纳蒙特帕斯基银行第四季度利润符合预期，首席执行官路易吉·洛瓦廖正致力于推进对竞争对手梅迪奥银行的收购。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA profit in the fourth quarter met expectations, as Chief Executive Officer Luigi Lovaglio focuses on implementing the takeover of rival Mediobanca SpA.】

item.title: 巴克莱承诺向投资者分红150亿英镑，此前其盈利超预期
item.description: 巴克莱银行表示，将在2028年前向股东返还至少150亿英镑（205亿美元），同时继续推进削减成本、提升盈利能力的长期计划。【原文：Barclays Plc said it will return at least £15 billion ($20.5 billion) to shareholders through 2028 as it continues to work through a long-term plan to slash costs and improve profitability.】

item.title: 肯尼亚计划修改养老金法，允许提前提取储蓄
item.description: 肯尼亚正考虑允许劳动者提前提取养老金储蓄，作为鼓励购买退休产品计划的一部分。【原文：Kenya is considering allowing workers early access to their pension savings, as part of a plan to encourage take-up of retirement products.】

item.title: 阿斯利康获利再攀高峰，抗癌药物助力业绩增长
item.description: 阿斯利康公司预计今年利润将进一步增长，其抗癌药物销售额的提升将抵消一款重磅糖尿病药物专利到期的影响。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc expects profit to grow further this year, boosted by sales of its cancer drugs as it works to offset a patent expiry of a blockbuster diabetes drug.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德即将以19亿美元收购电通总部大楼
item.description: 知情人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司即将以约3000亿日元（合19亿美元）的价格收购电通集团位于东京的总部大楼。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. is near a deal to to acquire Dentsu Group Inc.’s headquarters building in Tokyo for about ¥300 billion ($1.9 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 社交媒体巨头最后一次试图避免与学校的诉讼失败
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.、谷歌、TikTok Inc.和Snap Inc.错失了避免庭审的机会。此前美国各地公立学区指控这些社交媒体平台损害学生心理健康并消耗学校资源。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc., Google, TikTok Inc. and Snap Inc. lost a chance to avoid going to trial over claims by public school districts across the US that social media platforms harmed the mental health of students and strained school resources.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴推出开源机器人AI系统"RynnBrain"
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团推出一款人工智能模型，可协助机器人及其他设备执行现实世界任务，朝着最终引领多个人工智能领域的目标又迈进了一步。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. debuted an AI model that can help robots and other devices perform real-world tasks, taking another step toward an eventual goal of leading multiple artificial intelligence spheres.】

item.title: 埃及通胀率降至数月低点，或为降息创造空间
item.description: 埃及通胀率降至9月以来最低水平，这可能为本周晚些时候再次降息创造空间。【原文：Egyptian inflation slowed to its lowest since September, potentially giving scope for another interest-rate cut later this week.】

item.title: 股市将保持平稳，英镑从1.37美元回落
本田维持业绩指引，季度表现平淡，美国关税带来逆风
item.description: 本田汽车公司维持全年盈利预期不变，此前销售疲软和美国关税对季度收益造成了压力。【原文：Honda Motor Co. maintained its annual profit guidance after weak sales and US tariffs weighed on quarterly earnings.】

item.title: 资生堂预计在Drunk Elephant减记后利润将回升
item.description: 资生堂公司表示，在2025年因Drunk Elephant品牌减记导致数十年来首次亏损后，预计今年将恢复营业利润。【原文：Shiseido Co. said it expects to return to operating profit this year after posting its first loss in decades in 2025 due to a writedown of the Drunk Elephant brand.】

item.title: 凯波尔私募信贷策略获亚投行1.25亿美元融资
item.description: 全球资产管理公司吉宝集团周二发表声明称，已从亚洲基础设施投资银行获得1.25亿美元投资，用于其私募信贷策略。这是发展银行向亚洲该类资产配置资金的最新迹象。【原文：Global asset manager Keppel Ltd. has secured $125 million investment from the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank for its private credit strategy, according to a statement on Tuesday, the latest sign of development banks channeling capital into the asset class in Asia.】

item.title: 印度黄金ETF资金流入量超越股票基金，金价创历史新高
item.description: 印度投资者1月份向黄金交易所交易基金投入的资金超过了股票共同基金，这种罕见的资金流向逆转凸显出，尽管地缘政治和货币风险推动金价创下历史新高，但市场对黄金的需求依然持续。【原文：Indian investors poured more money into gold exchange-traded funds than equity mutual funds in January, a rare crossover that highlights sustained demand for bullion despite a record-setting surge fueled by geopolitical and monetary risks.】

item.title: 飞利浦预计中期利润率和销售额目标将维持在当前水平
item.description: 皇家飞利浦公司计划到2028年实现约15%的营业利润率，这家医疗技术企业正试图为其耗资巨大的睡眠呼吸暂停设备召回事件画上句号。【原文：Royal Philips NV is targeting an operating margin around the mid-teens by 2028 as the medical technology firm seeks to draw a line under a costly recall of its sleep apnea devices.】

item.title: 亿万富翁约翰逊的风险投资基金据称搁置出售40家中国科技公司计划
item.description: 知情人士透露，由富达投资亿万富豪约翰逊家族支持的风险投资公司八路资本，已搁置出售其持有的数十家中国科技公司股份的计划。随着地缘政治因素影响减弱及估值回升，该公司正重新考虑投资布局。【原文：Eight Roads, a venture capital firm backed by Fidelity Investments’ billionaire Johnson family, has shelved plans to sell its holdings in dozens of Chinese technology companies as geopolitical factors become less of a hurdle and valuations improve, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 哈西娜政党预见孟加拉国大选后局势动荡
item.description: 孟加拉国历史最悠久的政治党派本周被禁止参加选举，该党认为该国政治动荡持续，呼吁支持者抵制选举，称选举缺乏公信力。【原文：Bangladesh’s oldest political party, prohibited from contesting elections this week, sees political instability persisting in the country and called on its supporters to boycott the polls, saying they aren’t credible.】

item.title: 台积电1月营收跃升37%，人工智能投资持续推进
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造公司1月份销售额创下数月来最快增速，这表明全球人工智能领域的投资持续增长，尽管业界对行业泡沫的担忧依然存在。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s January sales grew at their fastest clip in months, a sign of sustained global AI spending even as concerns persist about an industry bubble.】

item.title: 阿达尼企业称正配合美国调查伊朗制裁问题
item.description: 美国财政部已要求阿达尼企业有限公司提供信息，以回应有关该公司向印度进口伊朗石油产品的新闻报道指控。【原文：The US Treasury Department has requested information from Adani Enterprises Ltd. related to allegations in a news report that the company imported Iranian oil products into India.】

item.title: 香港家族办公室数量自2023年以来激增25%，助力财富枢纽发展
item.description: 香港的单一家族办公室数量在2023年至去年底期间增长25%，达到3,384家，该市正致力于巩固其作为亚洲财富中心的地位。【原文：Hong Kong’s single-family offices rose 25% from 2023 to 3,384 by the end of last year, as the city moved to reinforce its status as an Asian wealth hub.】

item.title: CSL宣布首席执行官保罗·麦肯齐即刻卸任
item.description: CSL有限公司首席执行官保罗·麦肯齐即刻卸任，此前该公司刚刚取消了将旗下Seqirus疫苗业务分拆上市的短期计划，而该计划实施仅数月便告终止。【原文：CSL Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Paul McKenzie is stepping down effective immediately, just months after the company scrapped a short-lived plan to spin off its Seqirus vaccine business.】
